display_html:
data DExp
  • = DVarE Name
  • | DConE Name
  • | DLitE Lit
  • | DAppE DExp DExp
  • | DAppTypeE DExp DType
  • | DLamE [Name] DExp
  • | DCaseE DExp [DMatch]
  • | DLetE [DLetDec] DExp
  • | DSigE DExp DType
  • | DStaticE DExp
name: DExp DVarE DConE DLitE DAppE DAppTypeE DLamE DCaseE DLetE DSigE DStaticE

display_html:
data DLetDec
  • = DFunD Name [DClause]
  • | DValD DPat DExp
  • | DSigD Name DType
  • | DInfixD Fixity Name
  • | DPragmaD DPragma
name: DLetDec DFunD DValD DSigD DInfixD DPragmaD

display_html:
data DPat
  • = DLitP Lit
  • | DVarP Name
  • | DConP Name [DPat]
  • | DTildeP DPat
  • | DBangP DPat
  • | DSigP DPat DType
  • | DWildP
name: DPat DLitP DVarP DConP DTildeP DBangP DSigP DWildP

display_html:
data DType
  • = DForallT [DTyVarBndr] DCxt DType
  • | DAppT DType DType
  • | DAppKindT DType DKind
  • | DSigT DType DKind
  • | DVarT Name
  • | DConT Name
  • | DArrowT
  • | DLitT TyLit
  • | DWildCardT
name: DType DForallT DAppT DAppKindT DSigT DVarT DConT DArrowT DLitT DWildCardT

display_html:
data DDec
  • = DLetDec DLetDec
  • | DDataD NewOrData DCxt Name [DTyVarBndr] (Maybe DKind) [DCon] [DDerivClause]
  • | DTySynD Name [DTyVarBndr] DType
  • | DClassD DCxt Name [DTyVarBndr] [FunDep] [DDec]
  • | DInstanceD (Maybe Overlap) (Maybe [DTyVarBndr]) DCxt DType [DDec]
  • | DForeignD DForeign
  • | DOpenTypeFamilyD DTypeFamilyHead
  • | DClosedTypeFamilyD DTypeFamilyHead [DTySynEqn]
  • | DDataFamilyD Name [DTyVarBndr] (Maybe DKind)
  • | DDataInstD NewOrData DCxt (Maybe [DTyVarBndr]) DType (Maybe DKind) [DCon] [DDerivClause]
  • | DTySynInstD DTySynEqn
  • | DRoleAnnotD Name [Role]
  • | DStandaloneDerivD (Maybe DDerivStrategy) (Maybe [DTyVarBndr]) DCxt DType
  • | DDefaultSigD Name DType
  • | DPatSynD Name PatSynArgs DPatSynDir DPat
  • | DPatSynSigD Name DPatSynType
name: DDec DLetDec DDataD DTySynD DClassD DInstanceD DForeignD DOpenTypeFamilyD DClosedTypeFamilyD DDataFamilyD DDataInstD DTySynInstD DRoleAnnotD DStandaloneDerivD DDefaultSigD DPatSynD DPatSynSigD

display_html:
data PatSynArgs
  • = PrefixPatSyn [Name]
  • | InfixPatSyn Name Name
  • | RecordPatSyn [Name]
name: PatSynArgs PrefixPatSyn InfixPatSyn RecordPatSyn

display_html:
data DForeign
  • = DImportF Callconv Safety String Name DType
  • | DExportF Callconv String Name DType
name: DForeign DImportF DExportF

display_html:
data DPragma
  • = DInlineP Name Inline RuleMatch Phases
  • | DSpecialiseP Name DType (Maybe Inline) Phases
  • | DSpecialiseInstP DType
  • | DRuleP String (Maybe [DTyVarBndr]) [DRuleBndr] DExp DExp Phases
  • | DAnnP AnnTarget DExp
  • | DLineP Int String
  • | DCompleteP [Name] (Maybe Name)
name: DPragma DInlineP DSpecialiseP DSpecialiseInstP DRuleP DAnnP DLineP DCompleteP

display_html:
data DInfo
  • = DTyConI DDec (Maybe [DInstanceDec])
  • | DVarI Name DType (Maybe Name)
  • | DTyVarI Name DKind
  • | DPrimTyConI Name Int Bool
  • | DPatSynI Name DPatSynType
name: DInfo DTyConI DVarI DTyVarI DPrimTyConI DPatSynI

display_html:
data Role
  • = NominalR
  • | RepresentationalR
  • | PhantomR
  • | InferR
name: Role NominalR RepresentationalR PhantomR InferR

display_html:
class Desugar th ds | ds -> th where
  • desugar :: DsMonad q => th -> q ds
  • sweeten :: ds -> th
name: Desugar desugar sweeten

display_html: expand :: (DsMonad q, Data a) => a -> q a
name: expand

display_html:
class (Quasi m, MonadFail m) => DsMonad m where
  • localDeclarations :: m [Dec]
name: DsMonad localDeclarations

display_html: bindIP :: forall name a r. a -> (IP name a => r) -> r
name: bindIP
